todos.title: Home Grown Management
todos.body: Is your management internally run and promoted from within?

todos.title: Thirty Percent Rule
todos.body: Does your division generate 30% of revenue from products introduced in just last three years?

todos.title: Bottom Line
todos.body: Does your company strive to serve people, make great products, and then make profits (in order)?  * Sometimes economic blunders that benefit people or product seem like curses in the short-run but end up being blessings in the long-run.

todos.title: Genesis Grants
todos.body: Does your company award internal grans for prototypes, seed funding, etc.?

todos.title: Embracing Goals
todos.body: Do your employees and partners embrace these goals?

todos.title: Does it Stick
todos.body: Do you try a lot of stuff and see if it works (accidently stumbling onto projects)?

todos.title: Translation
todos.body: Do you translate your core ideology into practice?

todos.title: Small Steps
todos.body: Do you take small steps and 'make a little, sell a little' (big things often evolve from little things)?

todos.title: OR v. AND
todos.body: Do you strive to have your cake AND eat it too?

todos.title: BHAG
todos.body: Do you set big hair audacious goals that disregard what's possible (BHAG should require no explanation)?

todos.title: Rank Employees
todos.body: Do you rank employees for performance (democratically)?

todos.title: Profit Sharing
todos.body: Do you implement employee profit sharing or stock options?

todos.title: Hubris Factor
todos.body: Do you have self-confidence bordering on hubris?

todos.title: Dream Team
todos.body: Do you have a vision of your dream team?

todos.title: Education Centers
todos.body: Do you have a strong education center?

todos.title: Credo
todos.body: Do you have a credo (lists responsibilities to different people involved in your business and how you will treat them)?

todos.title: Store within a Store (Walmart)
todos.body: Do you give your employees overarching goals and authority to operate on their own?

todos.title: Tortoise & Hare
todos.body: Do you get off to a slow start but win in the long run?

todos.title: Fail Fast
todos.body: Do you fail fast and avoid waste?

todos.title: Beat Yesterday
todos.body: Do you establish dashboard that show whether you are beating the same day, week, month from last year?

todos.title: Cult-like Culture
todos.body: Do you establish clear and cult like culture (clear expectations, elitism, strict rules combined with incredible autonomy and flexibility, core ideology, tightness of fit)?

todos.title: Fifteen Percent Rule
todos.body: Do you encourage technical people to spend 15% of their time on their own project (then allow them to run the new product division)?

todos.title: Synergies
todos.body: Do you encourage synergies and linkages?

todos.title: Change
todos.body: Do you encourage change and discourage complacency/status quo (create discomfort even if the company is doing well, there is no such thing as standing still)?

todos.title: Talent
todos.body: Do you bring out the energy and talent of your employees and partners?

todos.title: Internal Competition
todos.body: Do you allow your employees, products, shareholders, vendors, to constructively compete against each other?

todos.title: Gambler
todos.body: Are you willing to take gambles and fail fast?

todos.title: Persistence
todos.body: Are you persistent?

todos.title: First Failure
todos.body: Are you more concerned about the company as the ultimate creation instead of any given product as the ultimate creation?

todos.title: Beat Yourself
todos.body: Are you more concerned about beating yourself than competition?

todos.title: Organizational Leaders
todos.body: Are you more concerned about architecting an enduring institution than being a great leader?

todos.title: Tomorrow
todos.body: Are you always looking for opportunities of tomorrow and are you leading the change?

todos.title: One Person Owners
todos.body: 16 of 35 'Visionary' companies were founded by one person, the rest by multiple partners.
